import React from 'react'; import Rating from "../Rating"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import LoadingHex from "../LoadingHex"; import MessageBox from "../MessageBox"; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails return (
{loading ? : error ? {error} :
Back

{product.name}

${product.price}

{product.description}
{ product.countInStock > 0 ? In Stock : Sold Out }
}
) } export default ProductScreen
